model

Class ProcessorConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.AbstractModel
      • model.ProcessorConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IModel, java.io.Serializable

    public class ProcessorConfiguration
extends AbstractModel
implements java.io.Serializable
    Author:
    chusk3 This class encapsulates the variables that are needed to create a processor. As of 16 February, 2012 this includes: 1) a name - string 2) a map of ALU function names and the number of cycles each takes - Map 3) the numbers of ALUs in the processor - int
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • AddCycleMapping

        public void AddCycleMapping(java.lang.String opName,
                   int cyclesRequired)
        This is the desired method for adding a new cycle mapping to the Configuration. We don't want to wholesale replace the Map, as that could lead to losing some data in the previous map.
        Parameters:
